item.title: Breaking: Game Changer’s Tamil Nadu release in big trouble - 123telugu
item.description:
Breaking: Game Changer’s Tamil Nadu release in big trouble

Published on Jan 4, 2025 2:16 pm IST

The Tamil Nadu release of Ram Charan’s Game Changer is reportedly in jeopardy due to legal disputes involving Lyca Productions and director Shankar.

  • The Tamil Producers Council has been contacted to halt the release until Shankar finishes Indian 3.
  • An accident on the set of Indian 2 resulted in crew fatalities, leading to significant delays.
  • Legal battles have plagued Shankar's ability to work on multiple projects simultaneously.
  • Game Changer is positioned well for a release during the Pongal season, facing no major competition.
“It will be a big blow to Game Changer if the release gets halted.”

This legal situation poses significant risks for the film's release strategy and may affect its reception among the audience.

item.title: India's most successful actress made ₹10000 cr at box office, more than even Shah Rukh; beat Priyanka Chopra, Alia Bhatt - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Deepika Padukone Becomes India's Highest-Grossing Actress with ₹10,200 Crore at Box Office

Publication Date: Jan 06, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Deepika Padukone has emerged as the highest-grossing actress in Indian cinema, eclipsing male counterparts such as Shah Rukh Khan and Salman Khan by surpassing the ₹10,000 crore milestone at the global box office.

  • Deepika's films have earned a total of ₹10,200 crore globally.
  • She has grossed ₹8,000 crore from Indian films and approximately ₹2,200 crore from her Hollywood film, XXX: The Return of Xander Cage.
  • Key films contributing to her success include Pathaan, Jawan, and Kalki 2898 AD, each earning over ₹1,000 crore.
  • Deepika previously was not in the top 5 highest-grossing actors but climbed to the top in just two years.
  • Her closest competitors are Priyanka Chopra (₹6,000 crore) and Katrina Kaif (₹5,500 crore).
“Deepika’s prolific filmography has allowed her to leapfrog ahead of her male counterparts.”

This milestone solidifies Deepika Padukone's status as a leading figure in Bollywood, with potential for further earnings from upcoming mega films.

item.title: Golden Globes 2025 Highlights: Emilia Perez, The Brutalist, Shogun emerge big winners; All We Imagine As Light misses the cut - The Indian Express
item.description:
Golden Globes 2025 Highlights

Publication Date: January 2025   Source: Indian Express

The Golden Globes 2025 took place in Beverly Hills, showcasing the best in television and film. Hosted by Nikki Glaser, this year marked a significant milestone with a woman solo-hosting the event.

  • Emilia Perez led with 10 nominations and won awards for Best Picture, Best Supporting Actress, Best Non-English Feature, and Best Original Song.
  • The Brutalist received 7 nominations and 3 wins, including Best Actor for Adrien Brody.
  • The FX series Shogun won all categories it was nominated for, emphasizing its critical acclaim.
  • India's Payal Kapadia faced a notable loss with All We Imagine As Light not winning in its categories, highlighting challenges for indie filmmakers.
“Films like All We Imagine As Light can reach the same heights that a much bigger film like RRR did.”

The event underscores the importance of inclusivity and broadening the landscape of cinema, showing that language should not limit appreciation for film.

item.title: Game Changer Incident: Dil Raju and Pawan Kalyan offer financial aid - 123telugu
item.description:
Game Changer Incident: Dil Raju and Pawan Kalyan offer financial aid

Published on Jan 6, 2025

Source: 123Telugu

The upcoming Tollywood film 'Game Changer' experienced a tragic incident resulting in the loss of two fans' lives, prompting financial support from industry figures Dil Raju and Pawan Kalyan.

  • The film is set to release on January 10, 2025, starring Ram Charan and directed by Shankar.
  • During the pre-release event on January 4, two fans tragically died in an accident on their way home.
  • Dil Raju pledged Rs. 5 lakh to each of the deceased families.
  • Pawan Kalyan also announced an equal financial aid and criticized the neglected state of the road contributing to the incident.
  • The movie trailer has received positive feedback, generating anticipation for its release.
“The road, which has been in disrepair for years, lacked proper maintenance and lighting.” - Pawan Kalyan

This incident highlights the need for improved road safety measures, as the film industry rallies to support affected families.

item.title: Paatal Lok season 2 trailer: Inspector Hathiram, ‘Sir’ Imran Ansari enter big leagues; Jaideep Ahlawat is so watchable - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Paatal Lok Season 2 Trailer: Hathi Ram battles personal demons while probing a migrant worker's disappearance.

Date: Jan 06, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

The trailer for the upcoming second season of Paatal Lok shows Inspector Hathiram Chaudhary and IPS officer Imran Ansari teaming up for a challenging case centered around the disappearance of a migrant worker.

  • Hathiram is forced to confront personal demons while navigating a web of secrets.
  • New case takes place in Nagaland.
  • Show is directed by Avinash Arun Dhaware and produced by Clean Slate Filmz.
  • Digging deeper into Hathiram's character and moral dilemmas.
“Paatal Lok Season 1 was a milestone in my career, and the overwhelming love it received still humbles me,” said actor Jaideep Ahlawat.

The show will premiere on January 17 on Amazon Prime Video.

item.title: Meenakshi Chaudhary – I went into depression after The GOAT trolls - 123telugu
item.description:
Meenakshi Chaudhary – I went into depression after The GOAT trolls

Published on Jan 6, 2025

Source: 123telugu.com

Meenakshi Chaudhary, a rising star, opened up about her struggles with depression following harsh online trolling after the release of The GOAT.

  • Meenakshi faced severe online criticism for her performance in The GOAT, which affected her mental health.
  • She emphasized the importance of choosing the right projects after her earlier success with Lucky Baskhar.
  • Meenakshi has upcoming projects, including Sankranthiki Vasthunnam, scheduled for release on January 14, 2025.
“This experience taught me valuable lessons about resilience and project selection.”

Chaudhary's story sheds light on the pressures faced by actors in the social media age and highlights her commitment to her craft moving forward.

item.title: 'Pushpa 2' box office collection day 33: Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna starrer takes a slow start on M - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Box Office Collection Update: Slow Start on Day 33

Publication Date: Not Specified Source: Not Specified

On its 33rd day, 'Pushpa 2' featuring Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna has recorded a modest collection of 13 lakhs, indicating a slow start for the week. Meanwhile, the competition, including 'Baby John', also continues to face challenges.

  • Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna star in 'Pushpa 2'.
  • The film collected 13 lakhs on Monday.
  • Box office performance on day 33 reflects a slow start.
  • 'Baby John' is also struggling at the box office.
“The film continues to face challenges at the box office as competition remains strong.”

This slow start raises questions about the film's ongoing box office viability and its ability to regain momentum in the coming weeks.

item.title: Dil Raju speaks out on ticket price hikes in Telangana - 123telugu
item.description:
Dil Raju speaks out on ticket price hikes in Telangana

Published on Jan 6, 2025

Tollywood’s leading producer Dil Raju is gearing up for Sankranthi with major productions, addressing ticket price hikes in Telangana with the local media.

  • Dil Raju is preparing for the release of two films: Game Changer and Sankranthiki Vasthunnam.
  • He plans to meet Telangana CM Revanth Reddy to discuss ticket price hikes for the upcoming films.
  • Raju assured that the final decision on ticket prices would rest with the CM.
  • He expressed gratitude to the Andhra Pradesh government for already approving ticket price hikes.
“I cannot guarantee any changes at this time,” said Dil Raju regarding the potential hike.

The industry is awaiting the CM's response about these proposed ticket price increases.

item.title: Emergency trailer: Kangana Ranaut's Indira Gandhi declares herself the Cabinet, film aims to show untold history. Watch - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Emergency trailer: Kangana Ranaut's Indira Gandhi declares herself the Cabinet, film aims to show untold history

Date: Jan 06, 2025

Source: Hindustan Times

The trailer for the film Emergency, featuring Kangana Ranaut as former Prime Minister Indira Gandhi, has been released. The trailer portrays key historical events during the Emergency period in India.

  • Kangana portrays Indira Gandhi declaring herself the Cabinet.
  • Anupam Kher plays Jayaprakash Narayan, who communicates with Gandhi from jail.
  • The film depicts portrayal of violence and chaos during the Emergency.
  • Kangana tweeted about the film highlighting the historical significance of the Emergency and Gandhi's influence.
  • Other cast members include Shreyas Talpade as Atal Bihari Vajpayee and Mahima Chaudhry as Pupul Jayakar.
  • The film is set to release on January 17, 2025.
“1975, Emergency — A Defining chapter in Indian History. Indira: India’s most powerful woman. Her ambition transformed the nation, but her #EMERGENCY plunged it into chaos.” - Kangana Ranaut

The movie aims to offer a deep dive into the political climate and events during one of India's most tumultuous periods.

item.title: Bigg Boss 18 Nominations Week 14: Rajat, Shrutika & THIS Contestant Nominated For Elimination On BB18 - Filmibeat
item.description:
Bigg Boss 18 Nominations Week 14: Rajat, Shrutika & THIS Contestant Nominated For Elimination On BB18

Updated: Monday, January 6, 2025, 10:54 [IST]

In the latest episode of Bigg Boss 18, tensions rise as contestants enter the final weeks of the competition leading to emotional eliminations.

  • Bigg Boss 18 is nearing its grand finale, with increasing intensity among contestants.
  • A family week celebration brought emotional moments for the participants.
  • Kashish Kapoor was recently eliminated, surprising other housemates.
  • This week's nomination round involved complex tasks leading to disqualifications.
  • Rajat, Shrutika, and Chaahat have been nominated for elimination this week.
“It will be interesting to see what more twists Bigg Boss 18 week 14 will bring on the show.”

The outcome of these nominations will significantly impact the dynamics of the game as the finale approaches.

item.title: 'Emergency' trailer 2: Kangana Ranaut makes a hard-hitting impact as Indira Gandhi as the film promises t - TOI Etimes
item.description:
'Emergency' Trailer 2: Kangana Ranaut's Hard-Hitting Portrayal of Indira Gandhi

Publication Date: [Date not provided] | Source: [Source not provided]

This long-awaited film, set to release on January 17, 2025, marks the 50th anniversary of India's emergency declaration in 1975. The trailer showcases Kangana's transformation into Indira Gandhi, highlighting the gripping narrative the film promises to deliver.

  • The release was delayed due to censor board issues but has now received a U/A certification with suggested cuts.
  • The trailer depicts how Gandhi declared an 'Emergency' in India, emphasizing her powerful dialogue.
  • Kangana expressed gratitude for finally bringing this significant story to the big screen, especially as it resonates with current themes.
  • The film features Anupam Kher, Shreyas Talpade, and Milind Soman among others.
Kangana Ranaut: "This story isn't just about a controversial leader; it delves into themes that remain profoundly relevant today."

Overall, 'Emergency' aims to not only tell a historical tale but also provoke reflection on constitutional resilience.

item.title: Timothee Chalamet and Kylie Jenner make rare joint appearance at Golden Globes; can't take their eyes off each other - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Timothee Chalamet and Kylie Jenner sat together at the 2025 Golden Globe Awards. See their pic here.

Date: Jan 06, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Rumoured couple Timothee Chalamet and Kylie Jenner made a rare joint appearance at the 82nd Annual Golden Globe Awards on Sunday night. Kylie wore a backless silver gown, and Timothee opted for a black suit paired with a blue shirt.

  • The couple shared a smile and a hearty chat at the ceremony.
  • Timothee was nominated for Best Performance by a Male Actor in a Motion Picture - Drama but did not win.
  • The event was hosted by comedian Nikki Glaser, who made a playful tease regarding Timothee's moustache.
  • Both have kept their relationship relatively low-profile since first being linked in April 2023.
Timothee said, "It’s a great feeling to be in a room with so much love and so many great peers..."

Chalamet and Jenner's appearance has fueled curiosity about their relationship, but they prefer to keep it out of the spotlight.

item.title: Hyun Bin and Son Ye Jin Make Heartfelt Donation To Provide Medical Support To Patients - soompi
item.description:
Hyun Bin and Son Ye Jin Make Heartfelt Donation To Provide Medical Support To Patients

Publication Date: January 1, 2025 Source: Soompi

Hyun Bin and Son Ye Jin have made a significant donation to aid medical patients at local hospitals.

  • The couple donated a total of 300 million won (approximately $203,934).
  • The funds were split equally for pediatrics and obstetrics-gynecology departments at Asan and Samsung Medical Centers.
  • They expressed gratitude for being able to help and shared their hopes for sick children.
“Every time I see my child growing up healthy, I can’t help but feel an inexplicable sense of guilt when thinking about children who are not as fortunate.”

This generous act demonstrates their commitment to supporting children in need and the wider community.

item.title: Golden Globes 2025 live updates: No wins for India as All We Imagine As Light gets snubbed in both categories - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Golden Globes 2025 live updates: No wins for India as All We Imagine As Light gets snubbed in both categories

Date: January 5, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

The 2025 Golden Globes saw significant recognition for various films, but India's entry, All We Imagine As Light, left the ceremony without any wins after being nominated in two categories.

  • Leading the nominations was Emilia Pérez with 10 nominations.
  • The ceremony took place on January 5, airing live and attracting significant viewership.
  • Despite nominations, India did not secure any awards.
“India didn’t win any awards despite being nominated in two categories.”

The Golden Globes continue to adapt after previous controversies, aiming for a more engaging and entertaining show.

item.title: Golden Globes 2025 Complete Winners' List: The Brutalist, Emilia Perez and Shogun sweep top honours in st - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Golden Globes 2025 Complete Winners' List

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Times of India

The 82nd Golden Globes showcased notable wins for films and performances, with Emilia Perez and The Brutalist emerging as significant victors during the ceremony.

  • Emilia Perez secured multiple awards, including Best Motion Picture - Musical or Comedy and Best Non-English Language Film.
  • Demi Moore won Best Actress in a Comedy for her role in The Substance.
  • Sebastian Stan took the award for Best Actor in a Comedy for A Different Man.
  • The Brutalist won Best Motion Picture - Drama and Best Director for Brady Corbet.
  • Shogun dominated the television categories, winning Best Television Series (Drama).
"That belief corroded me over time... but then this magical, bold, courageous, out-of-the-box script called The Substance came across my desk, and the universe told me, 'You’re not done.'" - Demi Moore

The Golden Globes set the stage for Oscar buzz, with competitive races expected for the upcoming Academy Awards.

item.title: Chandramukhi makers send legal notice to Nayanthara – Here is what happened - 123telugu
item.description:
Chandramukhi Producers File Legal Notice Against Nayanthara

Publication Date: Unknown | Source: 123 Telugu

Nayanthara, known as the “Lady Superstar,” is facing legal complications following the release of her wedding documentary, Nayanthara: Beyond the Fairytale, on Netflix.

  • Dhanush has filed a lawsuit against Nayanthara, her husband Vignesh Shivan, and Netflix for using copyrighted material from his film.
  • The demand for compensation is set at Rs. 10 crore for the unauthorized use of a few seconds of footage.
  • The producers of Chandramukhi have sent a legal notice demanding Rs. 5 crore for using a clip from their film without permission.
  • Fans are eagerly waiting for Nayanthara's response to these legal challenges.
Dhanush demands Rs. 10 crore for the unauthorized use of his clip from Naanum Rowdy Dhaan.

This situation is developing, and updates will follow as Nayanthara's response becomes available.

item.title: Zendaya and Tom Holland engaged? Actor debuts huge $200k 'engagement ring' at 2025 Golden Globes - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Zendaya and Tom Holland engaged?

Date: Jan 06, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Zendaya sparked engagement rumors with Tom Holland as she arrived at the 2025 Golden Globes wearing a diamond engagement ring valued at $200,000.

  • Zendaya was nominated for Best Actress at the Golden Globes.
  • She wore a flowing orange gown complemented by Bulgari diamond jewelry.
  • Fans speculated she was wearing an engagement ring on her left hand.
  • The ring was confirmed to be a $200,000 piece from jeweler Jessica McCormack.
  • Zendaya and Tom Holland began dating after the first Spider-Man film in 2017.
"Did #zendaya just debut her Jessica McCormack #engagement ring from Tom Holland at the #GoldenGlobes?"

The speculation surrounding Zendaya and Tom Holland's relationship continues to captivate fans, particularly with the revelation of the expensive ring she wore at the prestigious event.

item.title: Aamir Khan's son Junaid Khan makes a BIG revelation, was diagnosed with…., his parents never knew until… - India.com
item.description:
Aamir Khan's son Junaid Khan makes a BIG revelation about his dyslexia diagnosis

Publication Date: Not specified Source: India.com

Junaid Khan, son of Bollywood star Aamir Khan, recently revealed that he was diagnosed with dyslexia at the age of 6, with his parents unaware until they read the script of the film 'Taare Zameen Par'.

  • Junaid Khan made his film debut in 'Maharaj' and is set to star in 'Loveyapa'.
  • His struggles with dyslexia were only brought to light when his parents recognized the storyline from 'Taare Zameen Par'.
  • He credits the support and understanding of his parents for helping him navigate his diagnosis.
  • Junaid emphasized a focus on overall development rather than just academic success.
  • 'Loveyapa' is scheduled for release on February 7, 2025.
“When they heard the script of Taare Zameen Par, they were like, ‘Ek second… We have seen this in our lives.’”

In conclusion, Junaid Khan’s open discussion about his dyslexia highlights the importance of understanding and support in overcoming personal challenges.

item.title: Deleted post by Toxic makers sparks discussion - 123telugu
item.description:
Discussion Sparks Over Deleted Post by Toxic Makers

Publication Date: Latest Telugu cinema news

Rocking Star Yash is set to excite his audience with the upcoming film Toxic, directed by Geetu Mohandas, following the success of the KGF franchise.

  • The production house KVN Productions recently made a social media post about an update regarding Toxic.
  • The post was deleted quickly, leading to speculation among fans who captured screenshots of it.
  • There is widespread anticipation that a promo might be released for Yash’s birthday on January 8, 2025.
  • The film features a star-studded cast, including Kiara Advani, Nayanthara, Huma Qureshi, and Tara Sutaria.
  • Toxic is described as a high-octane gangster drama, produced on a grand scale.
“The buzz grew after the production house posted and quickly deleted an update, leaving fans curious about the reason behind the move.”

The excitement around Toxic continues to build as fans eagerly await more information and updates from the production team.

item.title: Golden Globes 2025 Winners List: Emilia Perez Wins Big, The Brutalist Bags Best Picture Award. Full List OUT - Times Now
item.description:
Golden Globes 2025 Winners List: Emilia Perez Wins Big, The Brutalist Bags Best Picture Award

Publication Date: N/A | Source: N/A

The 2025 awards season has kicked off with the Golden Globes held in Beverly Hills, California, hosted by Nikki Glaser. This year, Wicked and Emilia Perez are leading the nominations alongside The Brutalist, which garnered the most nominations in the drama category.

  • Best Supporting Male Actor Television: Tadanobu Asano, Shogun
  • Best Supporting Female Actor Television: Jessica Gunning, Baby Reindeer
  • Best Picture – Non-English Language: Emilia Perez
  • Best Picture-Drama: The Brutalist
  • Best Television Male Actor – Musical/Comedy Series: Jeremy Allen White, The Bear
  • India made history with Payal Kapadia's All We Imagine As Light, nominated for Best Non-English Film.
“Golden Globe Awards 2025 Winners: Jeremy Allen White Takes Award Home For The Bear, Shogun Wins Big.”

This year’s Golden Globes showcased a diverse array of nominations and winners, celebrating both established and emerging talent in the industry.

item.title: Sunita Ahuja reveals living separately from Govinda, playfully says, 'In my next life, don’t be my husban - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Sunita Ahuja reveals living separately from Govinda, playfully says, "In my next life, don’t be my husband"

Sunita Ahuja has opened up about living separately from her husband Govinda, playfully indicating her feelings about their relationship.

  • Sunita declares they live apart.
  • She humorously states, "In my next life, don’t be my husband."
"In my next life, don’t be my husband."

This playful statement by Sunita highlights the dynamics of her marriage with Govinda, suggesting a lighthearted approach to their personal lives.

item.title: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan faces criticism for her interaction with daughter Aaradhya at Mumbai Airport - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Aishwarya Rai Bachchan Faces Criticism for Interaction with Daughter Aaradhya at Mumbai Airport

Date: October 2023 Source: Times of India

Bollywood actress Aishwarya Rai Bachchan has come under scrutiny for her behavior during a recent public appearance with her daughter, Aaradhya, at the Mumbai Airport.

  • The interaction sparked discussions on social media.
  • Critics have expressed various opinions regarding celebrity parenting in public spaces.
  • The event highlights the challenges of maintaining a private life in the public eye.
“Being a celebrity does not come with a manual for parenting in public,” commented a social media user.

The backlash demonstrates the intense scrutiny public figures face, particularly regarding their family dynamics.
